mapper.select:
SELECT CP.CHATROOM_ID, CP.USER_NUM,
TC.BOARD_ID, CR.STATUS, CR.REF_NUM, U.NICK_NAME, P.IMAGE_URL,
OC.OPEN_CHAT_ROOM_NAME, OC.OPEN_CHAT_COUNT, F.FILE_NAME
FROM CHAT_ROOM CR LEFT JOIN TRANSACTION_CHAT TC ON CR.CHATROOM_ID = TC.CHATROOM_ID LEFT JOIN USER_TB U ON CR.USER_NUM = U.USER_NUM LEFT JOIN OPEN_CHAT OC ON CR.CHATROOM_ID = OC.CHATROOM_ID LEFT JOIN PROFILE P ON P.USER_NUM = U.USER_NUM INNER JOIN CHAT_PARTICIPANT CP ON CR.CHATROOM_ID = CP.CHATROOM_ID
LEFT JOIN "FILE" F ON F.REF_NO = OC.CHATROOM_ID AND F.CATEGORY_ID = 11 AND F.FILE_ID = ( SELECT MIN(FILE_ID) FROM "FILE" WHERE REF_NO = OC.CHATROOM_ID AND CATEGORY_ID = 11 ) WHERE CR.STATUS = 'Y' AND CP.USER_NUM = #{userNum}
SELECT CHAT_CONTENT FROM ( SELECT CHAT_CONTENT FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE CHATROOM_ID = #{chatRoomId} ORDER BY SENT_AT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT P.IMAGE_URL, BC.BOARD_ID, BC.PRODUCT_NAME, BC.TRANSACTION_CATEGORY, BC.USER_NUM FROM BOARD_COMMON BC LEFT JOIN USER_TB UT ON UT.USER_NUM = BC.USER_NUM LEFT JOIN PROFILE P ON UT.USER_NUM = P.USER_NUM WHERE BC.BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT CHATROOM_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CHAT_ROOM (CHATROOM_ID, USER_NUM, REF_NUM, STATUS) VALUES ( #{chatRoomId}, #{userNum}, #{refNum}, DEFAULT)
INSERT INTO TRANSACTION_CHAT ( CHATROOM_ID, BOARD_ID ) VALUES ( #{chatRoomId}, #{boardId})
INSERT INTO CHAT_PARTICIPANT ( CHATROOM_ID, USER_NUM ) VALUES ( #{chatRoomId}, #{userNum})
mapper.select: SELECT CM.MESSAGE_ID, CM.CHATROOM_ID, TO_CHAR(SENT_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS SENT_AT, CM.CHAT_CONTENT, CM.CHAT_IMG, UT.NICK_NAME FROM CHAT_MESSAGE CM LEFT JOIN USER_TB UT ON UT.USER_NUM = CM.USER_NUM WHERE CHATROOM_ID = #{chatRoomId} ORDER BY CM.SENT_AT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE ( MESSAGE_ID, CHATROOM_ID, SENT_AT, CHAT_CONTENT, USER_NUM, CHAT_IMG ) VALUES ( CHATMESSAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{chatRoomId}, TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MI'), #{chatContent}, #{userNum}, #{chatImg} )
